abstract: With the season on the line, Joe Girardi kept his batting order intact against the Tigers' Rick Porcello.
snippet: With the season on the line, Joe Girardi kept his batting order intact against the Tigers' Rick Porcello.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT - The lineups are in for Game 4 of the Yankees-Tigers American League division series Tuesday night, and Joe Girardi is going with the same lineup he used in the first three games. Detroit's Jim Leyland made two alterations with the right-hander A.J. Burnett going for the Yankees instead of the left-hander C.C. Sabathia, who started Game 3.

headline.main: Besides Burnett, Yanks Go With Same Lineup
